website_summaries.verdict: The MartinLogan Mikros 70 is a quality in-canal earphone pair with no distortion, but bass lovers should look elsewhere.
pros: Quality audio performance with no distortion on deep bass tracks, even at maximum volumes
In-line remote and microphone for Apple iOS devices
Simple lightweight design helps earpieces stay securely fit
cons: Not for bass lovers, nor fans of brighter, crisper audio

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite IEM's
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where all the poor reviews came from; I'm not sure I can trust someone comparing these to "Skullcandy" or "Beats". Trust in the Martin Logan brand; one of the top high-end speaker manufacturers in the world, and know you're getting a quality product. A good deal at $100 less than the B&W C5's and an even better deal at 52% off (Sorry for those who missed it)! Sound is subjective; but these vividly support a good range of music form Jazz, Classical to Classic Rock and Hip Hop. Try a pair out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: V. Grewal

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but with the Martin Logan name, and having a pair of ESL's in my home, I figured quality is quality. These are just OK. They lack the bottom end I get with my other in-ears (that rhyme with pure). Tried each of the included tips, but just could not find the right one for the bottom end I was hoping for. If it's just a phone cord you want, these will work. But, if you are wanting the best clarity for music, these, for me, do not fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant thinking its another overpriced brand like Monster or Bose but I was wrong. Only issue are the volume controls which are a bit stiff and dont have a great feel to them, its hard to press the buttons without looking. Overall though I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HLF

customer_reviews.title: Very minor complaint
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice headphones/earbuds, whatever. My opinion is that they lack in bass and are physically too long for my ears. T hey pull out and down rather then feeling balanced in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor connecting pin
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissatisfied with how poorly designed these headphones are. It's only been a few weeks since I bought them and the connecting pin came loose and fell off yesterday. It looks like it's too late to return it to Amazon so I guess there goes ~$100. I've always been a big fan of martin logan so I'm very unhappy with the poor quality of the connecting pin.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: High end earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and very solid lower mid-range and lower treble performance. The owner's manual says to allow 50 hours of use as a break-in period to appreciate the bass response, and I am not there yet. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Cashion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity
customer_reviews.text: Sound is better than any other headphones or earbuds I've ever had! I was blown away by the clarity and quality when listening to music. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned dozens of ear phones including Harmon Kardon, Bose, and Bowers and Wilkins... But the MatinLogans are my favorite for listening to music for hours. The earphone fit well, and the sound characteristics are easy to listen to for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Guy

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably different in a good way from other headphones
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably different in a good way from other headphones. Bass is nice and deep without distortion. Vocals are clear and crisp. Only thing I wish it had was a ribbon wire
customer_reviews.author: Edlin

customer_reviews.title: Swing and a miss
customer_reviews.text: The sound was mediocre at best but the worst part is that the rubber buds won't stay attached to the ear piece. Tried to different styles with the same results, having my wife remove them with tweezers. Finally I glued them on, not exactly what I was looking for in earphones made by Martin Logan. I would have given them three stars if the rubber buds would stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gnatovich

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound, but light on low frequencies...
customer_reviews.text: In the quest for the perfect earbuds (that I can afford), the search continues. These are balanced, but light in low end volume and impact. The barbed earpieces stay in place while running, and they do a decent job of blocking out ambient noise too. Recommend if vocals are your priority over bass.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Schwiebert

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent, great mellow sound quality across the spectrum
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, great mellow sound quality across the spectrum, surprisingly comfortable for in-ear phones. I have several, probably six, others and these are the best. Shure and Bose are close, but not quite as satisfying overall.
customer_reviews.author: old gadget nut

customer_reviews.title: Superb product.
customer_reviews.text: Superb made product, articulate sound with great pace however they do lack the deep bass and very top end sparkle. Considering the price these are about as good as earphones get for the price bracket. No regrets buying these at all.
customer_reviews.author: mr s a robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic headphones. come in a great case, too. only negative is the remote - really not a great design.
customer_reviews.author: HEB

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: excellent product as expected from MartinLogan, they will not stay put while working out so I had to return them. If you are using them for other than the gym buy them! you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Campodonico

customer_reviews.title: Martin Logan Mikros Ear buds
customer_reviews.text: These sound great out of the box and even better after a run in period. Really enjoying them!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisSpeakman

customer_reviews.title: Very good; but not the ones for me
customer_reviews.text: Sound was very good! Although any attempt to use eq settings on any connected device results in diminished sound! Also, kept falling out of my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kaijay1

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful response for classical music, clear across the range - good bass which can be a problem in some headphones, and never harsh. Very comfortable cancelling out almost all other noise
customer_reviews.author: R Millward-Sdougos

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Someone tried to compare them with skull candy, This is something better than the $200 beats audio. The audio is so crisp, clear and amazing just so filling and no fake treble in them that's why i love them and transition in the frequencies is smooth. Don't give it another thought just buy these
customer_reviews.author: Daanish Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is excellent. The only problem is that the rubber earpieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent. The only problem is that the rubber earpieces do not stay securely attached to the earbud.
customer_reviews.author: SGE

customer_reviews.title: Not the same sound quality as their speakers
customer_reviews.text: OMG, these sound terrible. I bought these based on the quality of their loudspeakers. These do not support the prestigious level of the brand. The bass is thin, the mid's overpronounced and the treble sibilant. Soundstage is non-existent. My Yamaha EPH-20's easily outperform these in every respect. Very disappointed. Still looking for a great pair of in-ears.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Latson

customer_reviews.title: TeddyDaBear
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate set of in ear buds cords to thin but would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance and handling, the sound is very clear The 90 degree plug might be a weak spot, we'll see
customer_reviews.author: Per Jacobsson

customer_reviews.title: The Martin Logans were just OK
customer_reviews.text: The M/L were just OK. I wasn't wowed by the experience. The in ear fit wasn't get even as I tried all of the ear pieces. The price was good (they were used) but for a little more...ok almost twice the cost you could be blown away with a competing brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Martinlogan Mikros 70
customer_reviews.text: After owning these headphones for some time i have to admit these headphones exceeded all expectations, the highs are bright but not piercing, the mids are presented very well the lows are tight and powerful but not at all overbearing. not to mention the sleek black design a design that shows that the sound wasn't the only thing MartinLogan focused on. I have owned all types of headphones from all types of brands and these headphones top them all. Being an audiophile i have to have the best sound i can get especially when im not home to listen to my martin logan ESL's and that's exactly what this product brings, well balanced sound at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alec H

customer_reviews.title: Top notch headphones
customer_reviews.text: Top notch ear-phones. I really like them. They are definately above average in comparison to most other $100+ ear-phones. I cant say I've tried many, but I have tried a few. These sound good, worth giving them a try
customer_reviews.author: Anna

product_meta.title: MartinLogan Mikros 70 Mikros 7
product_meta.description: Inspired by the sonic clarity and detail of our legendary electrostatic speakers, the Mikros 70 reference in-ear headphones deliver the realism, richness, and purity of sound that MartinLogan's discerning customers have come to expect. With superb ambient noise isolation, listening through the Mikros 70 is like having your own private MartinLogan listening room wherever you go. High quality materials and obsessive attention to detail are as much part of this new portable design as in our traditional loudspeakers. The Mikros 70 body is constructed from black anodized solid aluminum and sealed with metallic hyper black end caps to isolate ambient noise. A 90-degree gold-plated plug, tangle-reducing cable slider, and simple, yet durable, black rubberized cord dampen and isolate noise that can be transmitted through contact and movement, transmitting the most subtle nuances of recorded sound and nothing else. Included with each headphone is a compact carrying pouch to assure safe stowage when traveling. Each pair of Mikros 70 in-ear headphones include a variety of ear tips (3 sizes of bulb tips and 2 sizes of flange tips) for a comfortable, snug fit that isolates up to 97.8% of ambient noise and provides outstanding sound quality with deep, extended bass. Mikros 70's have an in-line remote and microphone that controls volume, play/pause, track selection, voice control, and allows seamless transitions between listening to music and phone calls on compatible Apple devices. The remote and microphone also function with a variety of smart phones, digital media players, and similar devices with a standard 3.5mm 4-conductor socket. Exact function of the remote will vary by make and model and MartinLogan cannot guarantee compatibility with specific brands or models.
feature_bullets: Legendary Sound: Inspired by the sonic clarity and detail of MartinLogan's legendary electrostatic speakers.
Controls & Microphone: Never miss a call with Apple-approved in-line remote and microphone.
Simple Connections: Gold plated, angled 3.5mm jack with a durable, easy to grip housing for a solid and reliable connection.
Multiple Ear Tips: Comfortable, snug fit that isolates up to 97.8% of ambient noise with deep, extended bass.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
